thread.title: Shooter in Panama City, Florida, killed - local TV

title: Shooter in Panama City, Florida, killed - local TV
text:
Shooter in Panama City, Florida, killed - local TV Tuesday, May 22, 2018 - 01:17
Police in Panama City, Florida, were engaged in a standoff with an active shooter who barricaded himself inside an apartment complex at a busy intersection on Tuesday. Resident Geraldine Rinaldi videotaped the encounter. Rough Cut
